languages.text: "Несколько месяцев назад на Янусе начались бунты. Вначале мне даже не доложили о происходящем: недовольства черни — забота стражи. Увы, я узнала о происходящем только после того, как мерзавцы начали покушаться на благородные семейства". {n}Вистенца качает головой.{/n} "И тогда выяснилось, что за тем, что в записях Администратума названо "волнениями", скрывались организованные атаки на инфраструктуру и лидеров общества!"

traits.locale_text: "Несколько месяцев назад на Янусе начали возникать бунты. Вначале мне даже не доложили о происходящем: недовольства черни — забота службы безопасности. Увы, я узнала о происходящем только после того, как мерзавцы начали покушаться на благородные семейства." {n}Вистенца качает головой.{/n} "За тем, что в записях администратумов названо "волнениями масс", скрывались скоординированные атаки на инфраструктуру и лидеров общества".

languages.text: "Several months ago, uprisings broke out on Janus. I was not even notified at first: griping worms are for wardens to worry about. Alas, I only learned of what was happening after the miscreants began targeting noble families." {n}Vistenza shakes her head.{/n} "And then it became apparent that what the Administratum's accounts had referred to as 'unrest,' were in fact organised attacks on infrastructure and society leaders!"
languages.original_text: "Несколько месяцев назад на Янусе начались бунты. Вначале мне даже не доложили о происходящем: недовольства черни — забота стражи. Увы, я узнала о происходящем только после того, как мерзавцы начали покушаться на благородные семейства". {n}Вистенца качает головой.{/n} "И тогда выяснилось, что за тем, что в записях Администратума названо "волнениями", скрывались организованные атаки на инфраструктуру и лидеров общества!"

traits.locale_text: "Several months ago, uprisings broke out on Janus. I was not even notified at first: griping worms are for guards to worry about. Alas, I only learned of what was happening after the miscreants began targeting noble families." {n}Vistenza shakes her head.{/n} "And then it became apparent that what the administrators had referred to as 'unrest' in their reports, were in fact organized attacks on infrastructure and society leaders! By that point, they had already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and moved on to assassination attempts."

"Several months ago, uprisings broke out on Janus. I was not even notified at first: griping worms are for guards to worry about. Alas, I only learned of what was happening after the miscreants began targeting noble families." {n}Vistenza shakes her head.{/n} "And then it became apparent that what the Administratum's accounts had referred to as 'unrest', were in fact organized attacks on infrastructure and society leaders!"

"Several months ago, uprisings broke out on Janus. I was not even notified at first: griping worms are for guards to worry about. Alas, I only learned of what was happening after the miscreants began targeting noble families." {n}Vistenza shakes her head.{/n} "And then it became apparent that what the administrators had referred to as 'unrest' in their reports, were in fact organized attacks on infrastructure and society leaders! By that point, they had already brought 13 agri-complexes to a halt and moved on to assassination attempts."

"Several months ago, uprisings broke out on Janus. I was not even notified at first: griping worms are for wardens to worry about. Alas, I only learned of what was happening after the miscreants began targeting noble families." {n}Vistenza shakes her head.{/n} "And then it became apparent that what the Administratum's accounts had referred to as 'unrest,' were in fact organised attacks on infrastructure and society leaders!"

languages.text: “几个月前，加努斯爆发了叛乱。我一开始甚至都没有收到通知，因为那些害虫是守卫负责处理的问题。唉，直到那些恶棍开始对贵族家族下手之后，我才意识到发生了什么事情。”{n}维丝坦萨摇了摇头。{/n}“随后，事情就很明显了。内政部所称的‘动乱’，实际上是针对基础设施与社会领袖，有组织、有预谋的袭击！”
languages.original_text: "Several months ago, uprisings broke out on Janus. I was not even notified at first: griping worms are for wardens to worry about. Alas, I only learned of what was happening after the miscreants began targeting noble families." {n}Vistenza shakes her head.{/n} "And then it became apparent that what the Administratum's accounts had referred to as 'unrest,' were in fact organised attacks on infrastructure and society leaders!"

traits.locale_text: “几个月前，加努斯爆发了叛乱。我一开始甚至都没有收到通知，因为那些害虫是守卫负责处理的问题。唉，直到那些恶棍开始对贵族家族下手之后，我才意识到发生了什么事情。”{n}维丝坦萨摇了摇头。{/n}“随后，事情就很明显了。内政部所称的‘动乱’，实际上是针对基础设施与社会领袖，有组织、有预谋的袭击！”

languages.text: «Hace unos meses se produjeron varias revueltas en Janus. Al principio, ni siquiera fui informada de ellas: los gusanos son un asunto para los subalternos. Solo llegué a enterarme cuando esa chusma empezó a atacar a las familias nobles». {n}Vistenza niega con la cabeza.{/n} «¡Solo entonces quedó claro que el "descontento" del que hablaban las notas del Administratum era en realidad una serie de ataques contra la infraestructura y contra los líderes de nuestra sociedad!».
languages.original_text: "Several months ago, uprisings broke out on Janus. I was not even notified at first: griping worms are for wardens to worry about. Alas, I only learned of what was happening after the miscreants began targeting noble families." {n}Vistenza shakes her head.{/n} "And then it became apparent that what the Administratum's accounts had referred to as 'unrest,' were in fact organised attacks on infrastructure and society leaders!"

traits.locale_text: «Hace unos meses se produjeron varias revueltas en Janus. Al principio, ni siquiera fui informada de ellas: los gusanos son un asunto para los subalternos. Solo llegué a enterarme cuando esa chusma empezó a atacar a las familias nobles». {n}Vistenza niega con la cabeza.{/n} «¡Solo entonces quedó claro que el "descontento" del que hablaban las notas del Administratum era en realidad una serie de ataques contra la infraestructura y contra los líderes de nuestra sociedad!».

languages.text: 「数ヶ月前、ヤヌスで反乱が起きました。当初は私に知らされることもありませんでした。不快な虫けらなど、ワーデンが対処すべきでしょう。哀しいかな、異端者どもが貴族を攻撃対象にしてようやく、何が起きているのかを知ったのです」{n}ヴィステンツァは首を振る。{/n}「その後、行政局の報告で『騒動』と評されたのが明らかになりましたが、その実態はインフラ設備や社会的リーダーへの周到な攻撃だったのです！」
languages.original_text: "Several months ago, uprisings broke out on Janus. I was not even notified at first: griping worms are for wardens to worry about. Alas, I only learned of what was happening after the miscreants began targeting noble families." {n}Vistenza shakes her head.{/n} "And then it became apparent that what the Administratum's accounts had referred to as 'unrest,' were in fact organised attacks on infrastructure and society leaders!"

traits.locale_text: 「数ヶ月前、ヤヌスで反乱が起きました。当初は私に知らされることもありませんでした。不快な虫けらなど、ワーデンが対処すべきでしょう。哀しいかな、異端者どもが貴族を攻撃対象にしてようやく、何が起きているのかを知ったのです」{n}ヴィステンツァは首を振る。{/n}「その後、行政局の報告で『騒動』と評されたのが明らかになりましたが、その実態はインフラ設備や社会的リーダーへの周到な攻撃だったのです！」

languages.text: "Vor einigen Monaten brachen auf Janus Aufstände aus. Ich wurde zunächst nicht einmal informiert: Um Würmer kümmern sich Wächter. Erst als die Missetäter Adelsfamilien ins Visier nahmen, drang die Sache bis zu mir vor." {n}Vistenza schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Und dann wurde offensichtlich, dass die – laut Berichten des Administratums – 'Aufstände' in Wahrheit organisierte Angriffe auf die Infrastruktur und hochgestellte Personen der Gesellschaft waren!"
languages.original_text: "Several months ago, uprisings broke out on Janus. I was not even notified at first: griping worms are for wardens to worry about. Alas, I only learned of what was happening after the miscreants began targeting noble families." {n}Vistenza shakes her head.{/n} "And then it became apparent that what the Administratum's accounts had referred to as 'unrest,' were in fact organised attacks on infrastructure and society leaders!"

traits.locale_text: "Vor einigen Monaten brachen auf Janus Aufstände aus. Ich wurde zunächst nicht einmal informiert: Um Würmer kümmern sich Wächter. Erst als die Missetäter Adelsfamilien ins Visier nahmen, drang die Sache bis zu mir vor. {n}Vistenza schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Und dann wurde offensichtlich, dass die – laut Berichten des Administratums – 'Aufstände' in Wahrheit organisierte Angriffe auf die Infrastruktur und hochgestellte Personen der Gesellschaft waren!"

languages.text: « Il y a plusieurs mois, des révoltes ont éclaté sur Janus. On ne me l'a même pas signalé, au début. D'habitude, les rechignements de la plèbe sont du ressort des gardiens. Je n'ai donc appris ce qu'il se passait qu'après que ces scélérats ont commencé à s'en prendre aux familles nobles. » {n}Vistenza secoue la tête.{/n} « J'ai alors découvert que cette "agitation" mentionnée dans les rapports de l'Administratum était en réalité des attaques organisées visant l'infrastructure et les dirigeants ! »
languages.original_text: "Several months ago, uprisings broke out on Janus. I was not even notified at first: griping worms are for wardens to worry about. Alas, I only learned of what was happening after the miscreants began targeting noble families." {n}Vistenza shakes her head.{/n} "And then it became apparent that what the Administratum's accounts had referred to as 'unrest,' were in fact organised attacks on infrastructure and society leaders!"

traits.locale_text: « Il y a plusieurs mois, des révoltes ont éclaté sur Janus. On ne me l'a même pas signalé, au début. D'habitude, les rechignements de la plèbe sont du ressort des gardiens. Je n'ai donc appris ce qu'il se passait qu'après que ces scélérats ont commencé à s'en prendre aux familles nobles. » {n}Vistenza secoue la tête.{/n} « J'ai alors découvert que cette "agitation" mentionnée dans les rapports de l'Administratum était en réalité des attaques organisées visant l'infrastructure et les dirigeants ! »

languages.text: "Birkaç ay önce Janus'ta ayaklanmalar patlak verdi. Başta hâliyle dikkatime getirilmedi. Nankör pisliklerin icabına dizdarlar bakar. Heyhat, neler olduğunu ancak alçaklar soylu aileleri hedef almaya başladıktan sonra öğrendim." {n}Vistenza başını sallıyor.{/n} "Sonrasında ise Administratum'un raporlarında 'huzursuzluk' olarak nitelendirilen hadiselerin aslında altyapıya ve toplumun önderlerine yönelik organize saldırılar olduğu ortaya çıktı!"
languages.original_text: "Several months ago, uprisings broke out on Janus. I was not even notified at first: griping worms are for wardens to worry about. Alas, I only learned of what was happening after the miscreants began targeting noble families." {n}Vistenza shakes her head.{/n} "And then it became apparent that what the Administratum's accounts had referred to as 'unrest,' were in fact organised attacks on infrastructure and society leaders!"

traits.locale_text: "Birkaç ay önce Janus'ta ayaklanma patlak verdi. Başta beni bilgilendiren olmadı. Nankör pisliklerle muhafızlar ilgilenir. Heyhat, neler olduğunu ancak zalimler soylu aileleri hedef almaya başladıktan sonra öğrendim." {n}Vistenza başını sallıyor.{/n} "Sonrasında ise Administratum'un raporlarında 'huzursuzluk' olarak nitelendirilen hadisenin aslında altyapı ve toplumun önderlerine yönelik organize saldırılar olduğu ortaya çıktı!"
